text: Ke ngoko ukuba bayakuphikisa yithi: “Mna ndizinikezele kuAllâh ndawonye nabo bandilandelayo”. Kananjalo yithi kwabo babenikwe isiBhalo nakwabo bangafundanga: “Ingaba nina niyazinikezela na kuAllâh?” Ukuba benza njalo, ke baya kuba bakhokelelekile eNdleleni eLungileyo, kodwa ukuba bathe bakreqa, owakho umsebenzi kukuvakalisa uMyalezo, uAllâh Uyazibona izicaka (zaKhe)
